short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save text and copy it to your clipboard with a single button click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to paste words, links, lines etc... into something and save it. If you do this then you can copy it with the press of a button. Very useful for copy and pasting long texts.
